title: CBI conference: Boris Johnson veers off road in speech to business leaders
content:
1. CBI conference: Boris Johnson veers off road in speech to business leaders  BBC News
  2. Boris Johnson praises Peppa Pig in bizarre CBI speech  Guardian News
  3. UK's Johnson tries to woo businesses, praises Peppa Pig  The Washington Post
  4. Peppa Pig and prolonged pauses – it is, I think, time to start worrying about the prime minister  The Independent
  5. We all must go to Peppa Pig World, says UK PM Johnson in speech flap  Reuters UK
contentSnippet:
